message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and relevance to your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe its worth is not less than $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product directly from us at a special price of $14,500. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring you receive the best possible deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.
